pageContext.claim: “But [the virus is] a very serious thing, but we think we're in very good shape in the United States.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump was well aware the U.S. was not in good shape. Officials had warned him in January, he had received increased intelligence briefings on the matter, and a simulation months before revealed the weaknesses of U.S. response to just this kind of situation. On this very day, CDC officials warned Americans to prepare for community transmission of the virus.
